text:
[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings Time Deposit A.md]
[TOPICS: eligibility, interest_rate, tenure]

| YEAR                                       | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                              | Unnamed: 2          | Unnamed: 3          | Unnamed: 4          |
|--------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------|---------------------|---------------------|
|                                            |                                                                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| POLICIES                                   |                                                                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Category                                   | Provision / Rule                                                                                                                                                  |                     |                     |                     |
| Scheme Name                                | National Savings Time Deposit Scheme, 2019                                                                                                                        |                     |                     |                     |
| Legal Authority                            | Section 3A, Government Savings Promotion Act, 1873                                                                                                                |                     |                     |                     |
| Notification                               | G.S.R. 922(E)                                                                                                                                                     |                     |                     |                     |
| Commencement                               | Date of publication in the Official Gazette                                                                                                                       |                     |                     |                     |
| Applicable Rules                           | Government Savings Promotion General Rules, 2018                                                                                                                  |                     |                     |                     |
| Definition of Year                         | Twelve months commencing from the date of deposit                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Categories of Accounts                     | One-Year, Two-Year, Three-Year, Five-Year Time Deposit accounts                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Eligible Account Holders                   | Single adult; up to three adults jointly; minor aged 10 years or above; guardian on behalf of minor or person of unsound mind                                     |                     |                     |                     |
| Number of Accounts Allowed                 | An individual may open more than one account singly or jointly                                                                                                    |                     |                     |                     |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings Time Deposit A.md]
[TOPICS: interest_rate, tenure]

| YEAR                                       | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                              | Unnamed: 2          | Unnamed: 3          | Unnamed: 4          |
|--------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------|---------------------|---------------------|
| Deposit Type                               | Single lump-sum deposit only                                                                                                                                      |                     |                     |                     |
| Minimum Deposit Amount                     | ₹1,000                                                                                                                                                            |                     |                     |                     |
| Deposit Denomination                       | Multiples of ₹100                                                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Repayment Period                           | On expiry of 1, 2, 3 or 5 years, as applicable                                                                                                                    |                     |                     |                     |
| Repayment Procedure                        | Application in Form-2 to the Accounts Office                                                                                                                      |                     |                     |                     |
| Extension Facility                         | Allowed for same tenure as original account                                                                                                                       |                     |                     |                     |
| Extension Application                      | Form-3                                                                                                                                                            |                     |                     |                     |
| Time Limit for Exercising Extension Option | One-Year: 6 months; Two-Year: 12 months; Three-Year: 18 months; Five-Year: 18 months from date of repayment                                                       |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest on Extended Account               | Rate applicable to the category on the date of repayment                                                                                                          |                     |                     |                     |
| Maximum Extensions Allowed                 | Two times after initial repayment                                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Advance Extension Option                   | May be exercised at the time of account opening                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Revocation of Extension Option             | Permitted any time before repayment date                                                                                                                          |                     |                     |                     |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings Time Deposit A.md]
[TOPICS: interest_rate, liquidity, risk, tenure]

| YEAR                                       | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                              | Unnamed: 2          | Unnamed: 3          | Unnamed: 4          |
|--------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------|---------------------|---------------------|
| Interest Rate (12-12-2019 to 31-03-2020)   | 1-Year: 6.9%; 2-Year: 6.9%; 3-Year: 6.9%; 5-Year: 7.7%                                                                                                            |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Rate (on or after 01-04-2020)     | 1-Year: 5.5%; 2-Year: 5.5%; 3-Year: 5.5%; 5-Year: 6.7%                                                                                                            |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Compounding                       | Quarterly                                                                                                                                                         |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Payment                           | Payable annually                                                                                                                                                  |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Applicability                     | Rate at opening applies till maturity                                                                                                                             |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Rounding Rule                     | ≥50 paise rounded up; <50 paise ignored                                                                                                                           |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest Credit Option                     | May be credited to savings account                                                                                                                                |                     |                     |                     |
| Non-working Day Rule                       | Interest deemed payable on preceding working day                                                                                                                  |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest on Unwithdrawn Interest           | No additional interest payable                                                                                                                                    |                     |                     |                     |
| Premature Closure Allowed                  | Yes, subject to conditions                                                                                                                                        |                     |                     |                     |
| Minimum Lock-in for Withdrawal             | Six months from date of deposit                                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Premature Closure before 1 year            | Interest payable at Post Office Savings Account rate                                                                                                              |                     |                     |                     |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings Time Deposit A.md]
[TOPICS: eligibility, interest_rate, liquidity, tenure]

| YEAR                                       | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                              | Unnamed: 2          | Unnamed: 3          | Unnamed: 4          |
|--------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------|---------------------|---------------------|
| Premature Closure after 1 year             | Interest payable at 2% less than applicable TD rate                                                                                                               |                     |                     |                     |
| Special Rule (5-Year TD)                   | If closed after 4 years, 3-Year TD rate applies                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Recovery of Paid Interest                  | Any interest already paid shall be recovered                                                                                                                      |                     |                     |                     |
| Pledging / Transfer as Security            | Permitted                                                                                                                                                         |                     |                     |                     |
| Eligible Pledgees                          | President of India; State Governor; RBI; Scheduled Bank; Cooperative Bank; Corporation; Government Company; Local Authority; NHB-approved Housing Finance Company |                     |                     |                     |
| Minor / Unsound Mind Pledge Condition      | Guardian must certify benefit to minor/person                                                                                                                     |                     |                     |                     |
| Endorsement on Pledge                      | “Transferred as security to ……”                                                                                                                                   |                     |                     |                     |
| Status of Transferee                       | Deemed depositor until re-transfer                                                                                                                                |                     |                     |                     |
| Re-transfer of Account                     | Permitted with written authority and sanction                                                                                                                     |                     |                     |                     |
| Physically Disabled Depositor              | May pledge through authorised literate individual                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Payment on Death (Single/Joint)            | Payable to nominee or legal heirs                                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Multiple Nominees                          | Paid as per specified share or equally                                                                                                                            |                     |                     |                     |

[COUNTRY=India | CURRENCY=INR | REGULATOR=RBI | SOURCE=India_Stable_Assets__National Savings Time Deposit A.md]
[TOPICS: interest_rate, tenure]

| YEAR                                       | RATE OF INTEREST (%)                                                                                                                                              | Unnamed: 2          | Unnamed: 3          | Unnamed: 4          |
|--------------------------------------------|-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------|---------------------|---------------------|
| Minor Nominee                              | Paid to appointed person or guardian                                                                                                                              |                     |                     |                     |
| Continuation after Death                   | Up to three nominees/legal heirs may continue                                                                                                                     |                     |                     |                     |
| Interest on Closure after Death            | TD rate for original period; POSA rate thereafter                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Surviving Joint Holder(s)                  | Treated as owner(s) of the account                                                                                                                                |                     |                     |                     |
| Application of General Rules               | Applicable where Scheme is silent                                                                                                                                 |                     |                     |                     |
| Power to Relax                             | Central Government may relax provisions to avoid hardship                                                                                                         |                     |                     |                     |
